attributes.additional_details: In light of the recent terrorism (that word is not to be taken lightly) by youth & "gang" culture in London and subsequently a wider region of the UK we the tax-paying, law-abiding citizens of this country wish to enforce a reinstatement of compulsory military conscription for youths not actively involved in apprenticeships, parenthood or other work to re-install a level of discipline and respect for our proud and wonderful country and it's inhabitants.
